name: places/ChIJRdsAjfVZwokRAKJz_QJztvw
formattedAddress: 80 N Moore St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 80 N Moore St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
My husband and I hired Edenopolis to cater for our wedding; though to call them a catering company is a bit of a misnomer as they provide much more. We found them on Wedding Wire and we are both incredibly happy we did. For those of you unfamiliar, they provide feasting tables as a unique callback and alternative to current modern food arrangements for festivities and family gatherings.

Working with Richard, the owner, is an absolute pleasure from the get go and an honor as he regularly works with high-end clients. You can tell that he genuinely cares about the event and the people who it's for and has such a penchant for beautiful decor and arrangements; the tables are real works of art (see for yourself). Additionally, the food was of the highest quality: succulent sliced lamb, creamy dips and sauces, warm bread, fresh fruit and crisp vegetables, and we cannot say enough about the decadent Turkish delights and Neapolitan cookies and other desserts.

Impeccable craftsmanship, high quality ingredients and concise directions with a straightforward process that is clear and easy to work through, as well as an unmatched level of patience when dealing with allergies, changes in menu, and creative solutions to different venues and available amenities are what you will find when hiring Edenopolis.

Our family and guests raved about the experience and food and so will yours and we highly recommend you trust your event with them. We did and cannot imagine having done it differently.

Thank you Richard!

Photo Credit: Jully & Alex Photography

originalText.text: STUNNING, SUPERLATIVE, Pitch Perfect!  I cannot possibly overstate Richard's true passion for what he does, across client communication, flexibility in menu / approach / aesthetic, and the complementary force multiplier of the floral / food presentation on the grazing tables we contracted for our law firm's 5th year anniversary in the West Village.  Food was fresh, beautiful, tasty, organized, and lovely to look at.  He even made our firm's logo in fruit - hope these photos do it justice!

Food was fresh, beautiful, tasty, organized, and lovely to look at.  He even made our firm's logo in fruit - hope these photos do it justice!

originalText.text: Ricky created a fantastic culinary experience for our mother’s memorial. It was attractive, inspiring and delicious. His work is top shelf. Would heartily recommend him to all who ask.

text.text: Ricky created a fantastic culinary experience for our mother’s memorial. It was attractive, inspiring and delicious. His work is top shelf. Would heartily recommend him to all who ask.

originalText.text: Richard was very easy to talk to and super quick with accommodating our menu according to our budget and dietary restrictions of our attendees. We had requested a drop off catering for our university NY alumni gathering, and the food came in beautifully arranged, and looking delicious and colorful. Their services far exceeded our expectations, and we were very happy with his team.

text.text: Richard was very easy to talk to and super quick with accommodating our menu according to our budget and dietary restrictions of our attendees. We had requested a drop off catering for our university NY alumni gathering, and the food came in beautifully arranged, and looking delicious and colorful. Their services far exceeded our expectations, and we were very happy with his team.

originalText.text: It was such a great, easy-going yet very professional & high-standard experience working with Richard and his team. Edenopolis Events managed the catering for 500+ guests at our EdTech conference at The Times Center venue located in the heart of the Times Square. The experience we had was definitely 5 out of 5: not only the catering station looked just amazing with floral arrangements & decorations, but the food tasted really good - much better than one'd usually expect when getting food at the conference. Richard is a great talent & professional to work with, I absolutely recommend Edenopolis as catering vendor for your next event, if you're looking to have a blast and surprise your guests with excellent food.
